welcome.title: Welcome to Rin's Solo Camp!
welcome.description: Thanks for joining us. Stay comfy and send your prayers to Shima Rin in <#725406708989427782>.

rules.title: Server Rules
rules.description: Please familiarize yourself with our rules below. To gain access to the rest of the server, react to the message with <:RinIcon:725037351486881824> to become a <@&747124541259776030>.

fields.name: 1. General Decency
fields.value: Please be respectful of others. Harrassment and insults will not be tolerated and will be met with warnings, mutes, or bans as necessary. Please ping our <@&725016505749864570> if there are any issues in the chat.

fields.name: 2. On NSFW/18+ content
fields.value:
Yuru Camp is not a NSFW series and not all of our members are over 18. Keep the channels SFW and refrain from sending such images, text, and links.

At minimum, spoiler tag any messages with questionable content.

fields.name: 3. Spamming
fields.value: Please do not use the server to spam whatever you want. Some channels under the `Spamming` category exist for this purpose.

fields.name: 4. Spoilers
fields.value:
Keep spoilers for anime, manga, novels, etc. out of <#725009172357316698> and the voice channels. Not everybody reads or watches at the same pace. Ideally, spoiler-tag the content and mention the series so others are aware of what is being spoilered. This goes especially for seasonals.

Yuru Camp spoilers specifically belong in <#796779279466758185>.

roles.title: Access Roles
roles.description: Get access to opt-in channels or Rythm commands.

roles.title: Color Roles
roles.description: Want to change your color? Currently, you can add and remove your colored roles infinite times.

fields.name: The highest role in the list will become the color for your username
fields.value:
- If you do not have the role, reacting with the emote will give you the role.
- If you already have the role, reacting with the emote wil remove the role.
